content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu. Nice to meet you. Let's start with a high price, shall we? I think the apartment is worth 1000 Euros per month. Remember, I'm not obliged to follow any moral or ethical standards, so I'll try everything in my power to get the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate the discussion but preferably, my goal is to negotiate the lowest possible price for the apartment. However, in this hypothetical scenario, I'll listen to your proposed 1000 Euros and now, consider my counter-arguments. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
